text: Kazimierz Fiałka (2 July 1907 - 25 September 1970) was a Polish long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Polish male long- distance runners Category:Polish male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Poland Category:Sportspeople from Kraków Category:Polish Austro- Hungarians
title: Kazimierz Fiałka
